statements: UPDATE face_recognition_data SET recognition_result = 'Match' WHERE person_id = 1;
UPDATE face_recognition_data SET timestamp = '2022-01-01 12:00:00', recognition_result = 'No Match' WHERE person_id = 2;
UPDATE face_recognition_data SET recognition_result = 'Verified' WHERE person_id = 1;
UPDATE face_recognition_data SET timestamp = NOW(), recognition_result = 'Rejected' WHERE person_id = 2;
UPDATE facial_recognition_data SET image_url = 'new_image.jpg' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE facial_analysis_results SET analysis_date = '2022-10-15', analysis_result = '{"face_count": 3}' WHERE image_id = 2;
UPDATE facial_recognition_data SET facial_features = '{"eyes": "blue", "nose": "straight", "smile": true}', detection_timestamp = '2022-07-15 10:30:00' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE facial_analysis_results SET analysis_result = '{"age": 35, "gender": "female", "emotion": "happy"}', analysis_date = '2022-07-15' WHERE image_id = 3;
UPDATE facial_recognition_data SET age=30, name='John Doe' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE face_pattern_analysis SET pattern_strength=5, pattern_type='Striped' WHERE id=2;
UPDATE facial_recognition_data SET age = 30, gender = 'Male' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE face_pattern_analysis SET pattern_strength = 8 WHERE face_id = 10
UPDATE FaceImages SET image_data = 'new_image_data' WHERE face_id = 1;
UPDATE FaceFeatures SET features = '{"eyes": true, "nose": true, "mouth": true}' WHERE face_id = 2;
UPDATE FaceImages SET timestamp = NOW() WHERE face_id = 12345;
UPDATE FaceEvents SET event_type = 'Login' WHERE event_id = 54321;
UPDATE facial_recognition_data SET person_name = 'John Doe' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE facial_encodings SET accuracy = 0.95, created_at = '2022-01-10 08:30:00' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE facial_recognition_data SET person_name = 'Alice', facial_features = '{"eye_color": "blue", "hair_color": "blonde"}' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE facial_encodings SET accuracy = 0.93, created_at = NOW() WHERE id = 3
